snippet.title: Zirquitz: The Logic Puzzle Game You’ve Been Waiting For! Playtest Now on Steam
snippet.description:
Step into the world of Zirquitz, a groundbreaking idle strategy game where logic meets creativity. Build intricate node graphs, solve challenging puzzles, and unlock endless possibilities. Whether you’re new to node-based games or a seasoned puzzle strategist, Zirquitz has something for everyone.

🧩 Features Include:
- An intuitive tutorial to get you started.
- A limitless sandbox mode for experimentation.
- A high-stakes challenge mode for real-time puzzle strategy lovers.

🎮 Playtest Available Now:
Experience Zirquitz today! Join the playtest on Steam and share your feedback to help shape the future of the game:
👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/3437460/ZIRQUITZ/

💡 Why Wishlist Zirquitz?
Wishlisting not only supports the development but ensures you’re the first to know when Zirquitz officially launches.

🔔 Subscribe for Updates:
Stay in the loop with the latest news and features:
https://www.youtube.com/@SurrogateOfSorrow

Many thanks to my good friend Alex for lending his awesome voice to make this video!

#zirquitz #logic #strategy #logicgames #strategygames #rts #rtsgames
